characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: If a model has the Standard of the Emperor Ascendant, you can add 1 to the dice roll made to see if friendly CHAPTER models within 6" of the bearer can summon the strength to make one final attack when slain. In addition, whilst within 6" of the bearer, friendly ADEPTUS ASTARTES models automatically pass Morale tests, whilst enemy units must subtract 1 from their Leadership characteristic.
